title: FS:  T206 Topps Buybacks of Smith & Smith SOLD
author: Bridwell

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Topps Buybacks of Smith & Smith SOLD
posts.post_content:
Happy Smith T206 buyback (Piedmont)  SOLD
Frank Smith T206 buyback (Sovereign)  SOLD

Both are in nice shape for this insert type, with no creasing.
These were issued around 2002 and were inserts in Topps packs.
Shipping/Ins. included with a no fee payment method.
I will take the Happy.  Will send a pm
